backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing a control layout and capped event log, with methods to save layouts and emit or query events.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities in the control panel app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, fullscreen workspace rules, scrollbars, and control-panel-specific classes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app with a dark theme root and mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying dark theme and rendering the control panel screen with a toaster.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls with validation, type‑specific settings, and automatic default values.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Context provider managing control layout state, syncing with the backend, and exposing CRUD operations.
Renders different control types (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits signal events, managing local interaction states unless in edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Simple wrapper that renders the shared add-control button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable positioning logic in edit mode and updates layout during drag.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Toggles fullscreen mode for the workspace and handles unsupported or failed attempts with toasts.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Provides UI to export or import control layouts, showing errors and using file input processing.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and updates properties of the selected control, including ID, type, label, and radio options.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Switches between edit mode and runtime mode with a styled button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with refresh support.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Sh: Add-control button with modal handling and tooltips explaining disabled states based on panel mode and initialization.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders the workspace containing draggable controls and selects them in edit mode, showing a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides context access to control layout state and operations like selecting, creating, updating, deleting, and saving controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Manages fullscreen mode for a referenced element with cross-browser support and exposes enter, exit, and toggle functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity retrieval via context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Stores and toggles panel mode between edit and runtime, persisting the value in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent events from the backend actor on a polling interval and returns them with loading and refetch helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation for emitting control events to the backend and invalidates recent events on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables, global styles, control-specific styles, fullscreen styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates binary strings and generates deterministic 8‑bit binary codes from a string seed.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration values for different control types when creating new controls.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Triggers a JSON file download by creating a blob and temporary link element.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, exports, and imports control layout JSON, including binary code checks and ID uniqueness.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Provides safe wrappers for browser APIs like localStorage, hostname, and fullscreen checks to avoid runtime errors.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Renders the main control panel layout including workspace, inspector, signals, and UI controls with mode-dependent sidebars.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configurations, including buttons, toggles, sliders, and radio groups.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including existing features, new feature requests, and metadata.
